name: Mouse to move
description:
Mouse to move is a bullet hell game in which the only focus is dodging. After 10 seconds the enemy will switch up its shooting pattern. 

There are currently 9 different shooting patterns, each ranked in my personal opinion from easiest to hardest (order might change according to feedback).

I still plan to add a start menu and a proper game over screen, but other than that, the game is mostly complete.

This is my first published game, all constructive criticism is welcome.
